item.title: This Will Be Fun
item.description: [[authors/lex croucher|Lex Croucher]], this is not. This landed on the wrong side of cheesy for me, and whoever compared it to The Princess Bride should have to answer for themselves. Itâ€™s a second-chance romance twice over, with two different couples who seem better off apart (although the lesbian couple was marginally better).
